subject: Football
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Mario Williams, the top pass rusher on the free-agent market, became the third N.F.L. player, and the first defensive player, to receive such a big guaranteed contract.
snippet: Mario Williams, the top pass rusher on the free-agent market, became the third N.F.L. player, and the first defensive player, to receive such a big guaranteed contract.
